tpeg_message.summary: M4 Bridgend - One lane closed on M4 eastbound from J37, A4229 (Pyle) to J36, A4061 (Bridgend), because of roadworks.

A55 Conwy - Queues on A55 North Wales Expressway westbound from J17, A547 (Conwy Morfa) to J16a, Glan-Yr-Afon (Dwygyfylchi), because of emergency repairs earlier. All lanes have been re-opened.
